pageTitle: Release notes for Hadoop components on Azure HDInsight | Microsoft Azure
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {1095=United States: 1-800-867-1389 United States: 1-800-867-1389, 211345=HDInsight version 3.1 uses a Hadoop distribution that is based on the Hortonworks Data Platform 2.1.7. This is the default Hadoop cluster created when using the Azure portal after 11/7/2014. HDInsight 3.1 clusters created before 11/7/2014 were based on the Hortonworks Data Platform 2.1.1}

textAfterTable: Cloud Service All N/A Intermittent MapReduce shuffle issue for HDInsight 3.2 Fix for a rare, intermittent race condition in Map Reduce Shuffle on large clusters resulting in occassional task failures. See MAPREDUCE-6361 for more information. Hadoop Core All MAPREDUCE-6361 Move to Latest Azure Java SDK 2.2 for HDInsight 3.2 Moved to latest version of the Azure SDK for Java used by the WASB driver. The latest SDK has a few fixes and the release notes for the same are available at https://github.com/Azure/azure-storage-java/blob/master/ChangeLog.txt. Hadoop Core All HADOOP-11959 Move to HDP 2.1.15 for HDInsight 3.1 clusters Hortonworks release notes for the release are available here. HDP All N/A Notes for 06/04/2015 release of HDInsight The full version numbers for HDInsight clusters deployed with this release: HDInsight 2.1.10.583.1575584 (HDP 1.3.12.0-01795 - unchanged) HDInsight 3.0.6.583.1575584 (HDP 2.0.13.0-2117 - unchanged) HDInsight 3.1.3.583.1575584 (HDP 2.1.12.1-0003 - unchanged) HDInsight 3.2.4.583.1575584 (HDP 2.2.6.1-1) SDK 1.5.8 This release contains the following updates.
